set.name: DMD-17 Beginning Dragon Deck: Crystal Memory Dragon

property.name: Race
property.value: Crystal Command Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SYMPATHY}: Liquid People (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Liquid People in play. It can't cost less than 1.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 3 cards. ■ This creature can't be blocked. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rarity

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GRAVITY ZERO} If you have 3 creatures in the battle zone that have no abilities, you may summon this creature for no cost. ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Liquid People. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.
